name: Home Sweet Home (itch) (yannlesaint)
description:
End of the year student project made by a group of three people !

Text in game are only in french, sorry...

Incarnate two old grandpa who've been locked in a retirement against their will, expelled from their house in the coutryside. Unfortunatly, one of them is getting alzheimer so they decide the escape, to see their house one last time before it disappear...

Control the two of them simultaneously to resolve (and finish) the level ! One is in a (modified) wheelchair : he can use a boost to move quickly and make long jump. The other one need a rod to walk...but he can walk ! Meaning he can make little high jump, to climb. 

Available on Windows & Mac, need a controler.

---  CREDITS ---

Animation & modelisation : Alexandre Leroy

Modelisation & artwork : Florian Houssa

Programmation : Yann Le Saint
